body_html:
When I confirmed this bug two months ago the model had the input tensor and finetuning so on our side we was involved with the feeds_inputs issue but also with the batch_norm/fine-tuning.
I don't think that we have a dedicated issue for tf.keras cause often it is not clear where people open the tickets (keras or tf.keras?). For sure we could have some impact in #19295 other that here.
body_text:
When I confirmed this bug two months ago the model had the input tensor and finetuning so on our side we was involved with the feeds_inputs issue but also with the batch_norm/fine-tuning.
I don't think that we have a dedicated issue for tf.keras cause often it is not clear where people open the tickets (keras or tf.keras?). For sure we could have some impact in #19295 other that here.
body:
When I confirmed this bug [two months ago](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17950#issuecomment-389088438) the model had the input tensor and finetuning so on our side we was involved with the `feeds_inputs` issue but also with the batch_norm/fine-tuning.
I don't think that we have a dedicated issue for `tf.keras` cause often it is not clear where people open the tickets (keras or tf.keras?). For sure we could have some impact in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/19295 other that here.
